mapper.update: update movies set eng_title = #{engTitle}, release_date = #{releaseDate}, runtime = #{runtime}, certificate = #{certificate}, story = #{story}, flag = 1 where movie_id = #{movieId}
mapper.insert: insert into photos(movie_id, route, type) values(#{movieId}, #{route}, #{type})
insert into box_order(movie_id, audience, audience_date) values(#{movieId}, #{audience}, #{audienceDate})
mapper.select: select * from movies, box_order where movies.MOVIE_ID = box_order.MOVIE_ID order by box_order.audience desc
select * from movies, reser_order where movies.MOVIE_ID = reser_order.MOVIE_ID order by reser_order.R_NUMBERS desc
select * from casts where movie_id = #{movieId} order by type desc
select * from casts where movie_id = #{movieId} and type = '주연'
select route from photos where movie_id = #{movieId} and type = 'thumbnail'
